item.description:
1/11/10 UPDATE:

* Egypt and Jordan Trip: TRIP SOLD OUT!

---------------------------------------

Explore the wonders of ancient Egypt on this exciting group adventure!

Once again, we will be partnering up with the Global Expeditions Club and joining their members from all over the US and Canada on a classic expedition through Egypt!

Join the club on a group tour to amazing Egypt April 10 - 17, 2010 (with an optional 4d/3n pre-Egypt trip extension to Petra, Jordan - one of the new 7 Wonders of the World... making the entire trip run April 7 - 17)!

On this exciting 8 day adventure, we will explore the highlights of Egypt in the comfort of 4 star hotels and a 1st class sleeper train. This tour is an excellent option for those who wish to see the best of Egypt in comfort and with a group of fun, like-minded adventurers.

Price: $1,799

For prices, details or to book your space on this tour, follow this link: www.HeadOutAdventures.com

(NOTE: Head Out Adventures is the club's tour supplier for this group trip)

-----------------------------------------------------------------

The group size is limited and spaces will go very quickly, so be sure to book your spot early!

Included in this awesome adventure:

* 8 day, 7 night guided group adventure to Egypt (international airfare not included - though we can assist you)
* 4 star hotels throughout
* 2 nights on a 1st class sleeper train
* Guided tours of the Pyramids of Giza, Luxor, Valley of the Kings, Aswan,
Abu Simbel Temples, and Cairo with expert English speaking
Egyptologist guides
* Sailboat ride on the Nile on a traditional Feluccia boat
* Breakfast daily
* Entrance fees to all sites as indicated in the itinerary
* Airport and train station transfers
* All transfers and tours in modern air-conditioned vehicles
* Entry visa to Egypt (for non restricted nationalities)

* OPTIONAL: 4 day / 3 night tour to Petra, Jordan (making entire trip run April 7 - 17)

Click here for complete details.

Places Visited: Egypt Group Tour, Pyramids of Giza, Luxor, Valley of the Kings, Aswan, Abu Simbel Temples, Cairo, Optional: Petra, Wadi Rum, Taba

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This tour is being organized by The Global Expeditions Club. For more information, visit their website or contact them at:

E-mail: info@GlobalExpeditionsClub.com
Phone: 1.617.645.7689

Make Friends. Travel the WorldÂ®
item.name: Egypt: A Classic Group Expedition to the Land of the Pharaohs - 8 Days-TRIP FULL
